samples.question: What types of music do you like to listen to?
samples.transcript: I am not sure I have a particular preference in the music. So, probably depends on my mood. Sometimes I go for, I do not know, like some rock music or some pop. Well, at times I am in the mood for some classical music. So, it really depends. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: I'm not sure I have a particular preference in the music. So, probably depends on my mood. Sometimes I go for, I don't know, like some rock music or some pop. Well, at times I'm in the mood for some classical music. So, it really depends. Okay.

samples.question: Did you always like this type of music?
samples.transcript: Not really. I start I became a rock fan after I recent concert. I attended a live performance back in December with my friend Hoyu and the atmosphere was just electric. So it was basically something that I have never experienced before and I became a huge rock fan. Prior to that I have never been into rock. Okay.

samples.question: When I have free time I guess.

samples.question: Why is it good to discuss problems with other people?
samples.transcript: Well, I guess we as humans are social creatures by nature and as such we tend to share our ideas, share our thoughts with other people and besides when you discuss the things that are on your mind they it makes it basically easier for you to came to a some sort of decision or to come to a certain epiphany of sorts. So and also it is always interesting to know what the other person is thinking or what the other person where the other person stands on that matter. Okay.

samples.question: Is it always a good idea to tell lots of people about a problem?

samples.question: Which communication skills are most important when taking part in meetings with colleagues?
samples.transcript: Wow. So there are so many things that a good employee needs to have in order to basically bring benefit to the table, you know. So I feel like the basic thing is probably the ability to compromise. You have to be good at compromising and also I guess negotiation is also quite a useful skill to have nowadays because you do not always get your way. So sometimes you have to compromise and sometimes you have to I do not know like hold your ground but you have to know where the balance is where that sweet spot is. So I guess these two probably skills are the most important ones nowadays. Okay.

samples.question: And what are the possible effects of poor written communication skills at work?

samples.question: And what do you think will be the future impact of technology on communication in the workplace?
samples.transcript: Wow that is a hard one. So I guess if I were to take a period of I do not know like 20 30 years I believe even nowadays we are already seeing some developments in AI and I have recently seen this I do not know like video where they are saying where where they show that you do not really have to know the language. This AI tool helps you to basically translate simultaneously as you are speaking. So I feel like it would probably make the job much easier because you will be able to communicate with people from other countries without having to learn their language. So I think that is probably one of the basic change you are going to see in the foreseeable future.
